snippet: The state is ramping up its gambling business, but that may not be an easy answer to financial problems.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Moody's Investors Service report on gambling, which shows that financial community is souring on idea that casinos are an answer to state and local financial problems; contends report is especially timely, given that New York State is considering 17 proposals for four new casinos.
lead_paragraph: The state is ramping up its gambling business, but that may not be an easy answer to financial problems.

headline.main: Gambling on Casinos in New York
headline.print_headline: Gambling on Casinos in New York
